page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: There are three schools in the area. {CRICH JUNIOR SCHOOL }with 89 pupils aged from 7 to 11.There are 4 classes, one for each age group. {CRICH INFANT SCHOOL.}This is Church of England controlled and has 59 pupils aged from 4+ to 7.There are 3 classes. {CRICH CARR PRIMARY SCHOOL.}This is a Church of England controlled School with 24 pupils aged from 4+ to 11.There are 2 classes. The curriculum in each school is wide _ranging and includes Mathematics,Language,Environmental studies,Science,P.E.,Music,Drama,Art and Craft,Cookery,Needlework and Computer studies. At 11+,the children transfer to the {MORTIMER WILSON SCHOOL }at Alfreton,or to the {ANTHONY GELL SCHOOL }at Wirksworth.
